Interface RefereeSiteInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RefereeSite

    public interface RefereeSiteInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote

    • Method Detail

      • announceNewGame

        ReturnInt announceNewGame()
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Operation announceNewGame. It is called by the referee when he declares the start of a game.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • teams_ready

        void teams_ready()
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Operation teams_ready. It is called by the referee while he waits for the teams to be ready.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • informReferee

        void informReferee()
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Operation informReferee. It is called by a coach to indicate to the referee that their team is ready.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Operation shutdown.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
